caption.p: HPLC chromatograms of cultured P. cocos mycelia sampled on the 17th day ( a), cultivated P. cocos sclerotium ( b) and the three standard triterpenoid compounds ( c). The inset shows the UV spectra of HPLC peaks 1–8. 1, dehydrotumulosic acid (DTA); 2, polyporenic acid C (PAC); 3, 3-epi-dehydrotumulosic acid (eDTA); 4–8 unknown triterpenoids.
